inclusion.criterion: Iron supplementation for a maximum of 30 days prior to admission
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Inpatient Admission: The subject will be admitted to the CRU, or alternate UVA hospital unit, at 0900-1000 h.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin ≥ 11.5 g/dL for non-African American subjects
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin less than 12 g/dl and hematocrit less than 36%
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 17-year-old boy with symptoms of vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills, and loss of appetite. He has no underlying disease and is not on any medications.
